str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From apo and erchomai; to go off, aside or behind, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Verb - Pluperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Probably a fuller form of rheo; an alternate for epo in certain tenses; to utter, i.e. Speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To make ready, prepare. From hetoimos; to prepare.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The feast of Passover, the Passover lamb. Of Chaldee origin; the Passover.
